
```{r}
seq(-10, 10, by=0.05) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(x + sin(y)), y=(y + cos(x)))) +
    geom_point(alpha=0.1, shape=20, size=0, color="white") +
    theme_void() +
    coord_fixed() +
    theme(panel.background=element_rect(fill="violetred4"))
```
